checkOperatorStatus(uint64,address).details: Should be called periodically (e.g., by keepers or during other operations)

returns.operators: Array of operators that are offline beyond threshold

goOffline(uint64).details: Prevents slashing for missed heartbeats while operator is intentionally offline

goOnline(uint64).details: Must submit a heartbeat after coming online to be marked Healthy

registerServiceOwner(uint64,address).details: Only callable by the Tangle core contract

submitHeartbeat(uint64,uint64,uint8,byte.details: Signature: ECDSA over keccak256(abi.encodePacked(serviceId, blueprintId, metrics))      NOTE: Uses native EVM big-endian encoding. Blueprint-SDK must use to_be_bytes() not to_le_bytes()

params.signature: ECDSA signature of the heartbeat message

submitHeartbeatDirect(uint64,uint64,uint.details: Can be called directly by operators in trusted environments

DEFAULT_MAX_MISSED_HEARTBEATS().notice: Default max missed heartbeats before offline

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Domain separator for EIP-712 signatures (kept for backwards compatibility)

HEARTBEAT_TYPEHASH().notice: Heartbeat message typehash (for reference - actual signing uses raw keccak256)

checkOperatorStatus(uint64,address).notice: Check and update operator status based on heartbeat timing

configureHeartbeat(uint64,uint64,uint8).notice: Configure heartbeat settings for a service

enableCustomMetrics(uint64,bool).notice: Enable custom metrics for a service

getHeartbeatConfig(uint64).notice: Get heartbeat config for a service

getLastHeartbeat(uint64,address).notice: Get last heartbeat timestamp for an operator

getMetricDefinitions(uint64).notice: Get metric definitions for a service

getMetricValue(uint64,address,string).notice: Get a metric value for an operator

getOnlineOperators(uint64).notice: Get all online operators for a service

getOperatorStatus(uint64,address).notice: Get operator status for a service

getSlashableOperators(uint64).notice: Get offline operators that should be slashed

goOnline(uint64).notice: Operator comes back online after voluntary offline period

heartbeatConfigs(uint64).notice: Heartbeat config per service: serviceId => config

isHeartbeatCurrent(uint64,address).notice: Check if operator has submitted heartbeat recently

isOnline(uint64,address).notice: Check if an operator is online for a service

metricValues(uint64,address,string).notice: Last reported metric values: serviceId => operator => metricName => value

operatorStates(uint64,address).notice: Operator state per service: serviceId => operator => state

reportForSlashing(uint64,address,string).notice: Report an operator for slashing (called by slashing oracle)

serviceMetrics(uint64,uint256).notice: Custom metrics per service: serviceId => metric definitions

serviceOwners(uint64).notice: Service owners who can configure heartbeat settings

setMetricsRecorder(address).notice: Set metrics recorder address for reward tracking

submitHeartbeat(uint64,uint64,uint8,byte.notice: Submit a heartbeat to prove operator is online

submitHeartbeatDirect(uint64,uint64,uint.notice: Submit heartbeat without signature (for trusted contexts)

tangleCore().notice: Tangle core contract address for service validation
